EmailTemplate.name: Notice of Change of Racking
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice of Change of Racking {!Account.Name}, Lease #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for choosing SunPower for your home energy needs. We are excited to welcome you to the SunPower family.
We would like to inform you that the Mounting System for your SunPower lease has been updated to a substantially equivalent or better equipment with equal to or greater output.
Rest assured that the terms of your agreement will remain intact and unchanged. The attached “Notice of Change” document reflects the updated racking that will be installed as part of your SunPower solar system.
If you have any questions regarding your solar installation, then please feel free to contact your SunPower dealer/installer.
Additionally, you can also contact us directly with any questions or concerns by calling 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) and one of our Solar Advisors will be happy to assist you.
Thank you,
Sunpower Team
